article_title: Jennifer Aniston Inks Emirates Deal for Rumored $5 Million
article_text:
Jennifer Aniston has reportedly signed a deal to become a spokesperson for Emirates Airline.

The 46-year-old actress, who just got married to her longtime love Justin Theroux, is getting paid $5 million for the campaign, according to Page Six.

PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Jennifer Aniston

“Jennifer Aniston has shot a high-profile campaign for Emirates as part of this deal, for which she is being paid around $5 million,” a source told the outlet. “She will appear across TV and print ads worldwide.”

The Dubai-based airline is the world’s biggest international carrier. Nicole Kidman recently shot a campaign for Etihad Airways, the second-largest UAE airline.
